reasoning: The test captured a specific JavaScript TypeError ('Cannot read properties of undefined') at ModuleDialog.js:1025:30 when clicking the Quick Add Text button. This is a real code error - a null/undefined reference bug that prevents the feature from activating, which is a genuine application defect.
evidence_summary: Screenshot shows the Evoq CMS page editing interface with multiple empty content panes displaying Quick Add buttons (Text 'A' icon, Image icon, Module icon). The UI appears functional but the test detected a JavaScript console error when clicking the text add button, indicating the click handler references an undefined property. The Content Approval Workflow is active and Discard/Publish buttons are visible at the bottom.
scenario_id: DNN_HTML::Content Creation and Editing::Quick Add Text feature
